author: Special Correspondent
text:
: Irate public stoned a private bus that caused an accident here on Wednesday. Regina (25) of Sathya Nagar was driving a two-wheeler with her children Sherifa (7) and Roshan (5) towards a school when a private bus from Pattukkottai to Thanjavur hit the vehicle.

Regina and her children suffered injuries and were rushed to the medical college hospital here.

Irked over the incident, public sat on Nanjikkottai Road blocking traffic.

They gave vent to their ire by stoning window panes of the bus that caused the accident.

Officials rushed to the spot and pacified the crowd.

The offending bus crew escaped in the melee and a search was on for them.
title: Accident sparks protest in Thanjavur
